subject: Re: [LH] Conclusion
body:
On 5/14/07, TTuerff@aol.com  wrote:
> Yeah, I fall in the HOL camp too. I wouldn't call Aerial drivel (at least
> not the second CD), but it's not a masterpiece by any means, and HOL is.

well, then let me say this.  after waiting 13 years for a new album,
Aerial is a major disappointment.
